# VisualMWM <img src="man/figures/heatmapGIF_2b-day_1-trial_1.gif" align="right" width="160"/>
This R package provides tools to visualise Morris water maze date motion-wise!

<br><br>
  
## Installation
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install
devtools::install_github("Thonnard/VisualMWM")
# load
library(VisualMWM)
```

## Here we go...
```{r, eval = TRUE, include=FALSE}
# load some data
load("data/track_data.RData")
```
```{r, eval = TRUE}
# check data
head(track_data)
```

<b>Looks good! What can we do with this... Everything!</b>
